aureena:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
aureena:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

aureena:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
aureena:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
aureena:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

aureena:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
aureena:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

aureena:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
aureena:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage [E] times. NL (Deal !aureena:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

aureena:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
aureena:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable and !aureena:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.

aureena:Taunt.NAME: Taunt
aureena:Taunt.DESCRIPTION: Taunt an enemy. It attacks you this round.
aureena:Taunt.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Taunt all enemies. They attack you this round.
